data.text:
Nice hotel, close to the sea and the city center.
Recently renovated hotel with spacious rooms and comfortable beds.
Very good breakfast. 
The only thing that hotel would improve is the juice.
I would recommend not taking half board or full board because the dinner is not worth it.
data.title: Nice hotel

data.text:
sland Boutique Hotel reviews

￼

The Hypnosis Expert

-

EDIT

4/5

just now on Google

We recently stayed at this hotel. Here is the review.

Location: The hotel is located a short 2 minutes walk from the beach. Its close to the casino & many cafes, restaurants, shops & bars are only a few minutes walk away. Very central. The hotel is central to all that Rhodes town has to offer.

Staff: The staff are very friendly & efficient at their jobs. We were checked in by Irene & she is so warm & welcoming after a long night flight. All cleaning staff we met were also very friendly & helpful.

Rooms: This is a very new hotel. The entire hotel is very clean & smells very fresh.
Our room was on the first floor with a partial sea view. The bed was comfortable & there was a choice of two pillows.
The bathroom was adequate too but there seemed to be an issue with the seal in the shower & unless you were very careful the water leaked out onto the floor.

Room Facilities: Plenty of cupboard space for clothing. A fridge & safe. Lighting was good too. Coffee maker and small tabletop stove supplied.

Negatives: As stated the shower was leaking at the bottom tray when in use.

One one occasion there was no toilet roll replenished.

There was a lack of cutlery ie a good bread knife etc

If your a light sleeper do not book a room at the front of the hotel. The hotel faces onto a busy road & is above a busy restaurant. We were here out of season October on the 1st floor & even then for the first 3-4 nights we slept very little. Scooters, chairs being moved, buses etc make a lot of noise.

All in all this is a great hotel but it needs to invest in some good soundproofing on the windows for the front facing rooms.

I would still highly recommend it for a stay in Rhodes, it represents great value & just bring some earplugs if your a light sleeper.
data.title: Nice Hotel With A Few Soundproofing Issues

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to provide such a comprehensive review of your recent stay at our hotel. We're thrilled to hear you found our location convenient and enjoyed the warm hospitality of our staff, especially Irene. We're grateful for your appreciation of the hotel's cleanliness and the comfort of our rooms.

Your observations regarding the shower issue, room facilities, and the noise from the street are invaluable. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the leaking shower and any housekeeping oversights, and we've taken note of your suggestions for improvement.

We're continuously looking to enhance our guest experience, and your feedback about soundproofing in front-facing rooms is especially helpful. Your kind recommendation means a lot to us, and we hope to address these concerns promptly to make your next stay even more comfortable.

We're delighted you'd still recommend our hotel and appreciate your understanding of the noise factor. If you do choose to stay with us again, we'll aim to ensure a more tranquil and restful experience.

Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Best regards,
Island Boutique Hotel team
owner_response.author: Digital Marketing Agency

data.text: We stayed at the apartment on top - spacious place incuding a huge terasse with stunning view.It looks exactly like in the pictures!The location is also the best we would want - next to several beachbars,the aquarium and just a stroll away from the harbour and the old town.The staff were friendly and helpful.The breakfast-all we needed.There is a great tavern downstairs also!
data.title: Best place ever

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued guest,

Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We are thrilled to hear that you had the best experience during your stay in our top apartment.

It's fantastic to know that the spacious apartment and the stunning terrace with its breathtaking view met your expectations. We're delighted that our location was convenient for you, allowing you to enjoy beach bars, the aquarium, the harbor, and the charm of the old town.

We're glad that our friendly and helpful staff contributed to making your stay enjoyable, and that the breakfast provided all that you needed. It's great to hear that you also had a positive experience at our tavern downstairs.

We're grateful for your kind words and for choosing us for your stay. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back and provide you with another wonderful experience in the future.

Warm regards,
Island Boutique Hotel team
owner_response.author: Digital Marketing Agency

data.text:
Hello, this is one amazing hotel in Rhodes.
The staff is very kinde, the service too, and that location is very comfort to go everywere. Have good breakfast, on the first flor on this hotel you have a best place for lunch and dinner.
We come back next year too.
Thanks.
data.title: Amazing place

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued guest,

Thank you so much for your wonderful review and kind words! We're thrilled to hear that you had an amazing experience during your stay at our hotel in Rhodes.

It's delightful to know that you found our staff to be friendly and our service to be exceptional. We're also pleased that our central location made it convenient for you to explore the area. We're glad you enjoyed our breakfast offerings and the dining options on the first floor of the hotel.

We're truly honored to have had the privilege of hosting you, and we can't wait to welcome you back next year. Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we're committed to ensuring that your future visits are just as fantastic.

Thank you for choosing us, and we look forward to creating more wonderful memories with you.

Warm regards,
Island Boutique Hotel team

data.text: We had an incredible experience at the Island City Hotel. After being evacuated due to wildfires, we found ourselves stranded at night and were welcomed with open arms by the hotel staff. They were incredibly helpful and accommodating, going above and beyond to make sure we were taken care of. We cannot thank them enough for their kindness during such a difficult time. Highly recommend this hotel for their exceptional service!”
data.title: Wonderful experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued guest,

Thank you for choosing the Island City Hotel and for sharing your wonderful experience with us. We are truly touched by your kind words and are so glad that our staff could be of help during such a challenging time. Providing exceptional service and a welcoming environment is at the core of what we do, and we're delighted that we could make a positive impact on your stay. Your recommendation means the world to us, and we hope to have the pleasure of hosting you again for more enjoyable and stress-free moments in the future.

Warm regards,
Island Boutique Hotel team
